mapper.select: SELECT pi.prod_inbo_cd, pi.pcode, pi.prod_ver_cd, pi.lot_no, pi.inbo_status, pi.inbo_qty, pi.produ_prod_cd, pi.inbo_dt, pi.fcode, pi.fac_ver_cd, -- 부분 적재 고려한 남은 수량 (pi.inbo_qty - COALESCE( (SELECT SUM(ws.qty) FROM ware_stock ws WHERE ws.prod_inbo_cd = pi.prod_inbo_cd), 0 )) AS total_qty, p.prod_name, p.sto_temp, p.unit, p.is_used, p.reg_dt, f.fac_name, f.op_status, f.address FROM prod_inbo pi INNER JOIN product p ON pi.pcode = p.pcode AND pi.prod_ver_cd = p.prod_ver_cd INNER JOIN factory f ON pi.fcode = f.fcode AND pi.fac_ver_cd = f.fac_ver_cd WHERE pi.inbo_status = 'b4' -- 입고완료 상태 AND f.op_status = 'r1' -- 활성 공장 AND p.is_used = 'f1' -- 활성 제품 AND (pi.inbo_qty - COALESCE( (SELECT SUM(ws.qty) FROM ware_stock ws WHERE ws.prod_inbo_cd = pi.prod_inbo_cd), 0 )) > 0 ORDER BY pi.inbo_dt DESC, pi.prod_inbo_cd DESC

SELECT ws.wslcode, ws.ware_area_cd, ws.prod_inbo_cd, ws.item_type, ws.inbo_dt, ws.regi, ws.qty, ws.unit, pi.pcode, p.prod_name FROM ware_stock ws LEFT JOIN prod_inbo pi ON ws.prod_inbo_cd = pi.prod_inbo_cd LEFT JOIN product p ON pi.pcode = p.pcode AND pi.prod_ver_cd = p.prod_ver_cd WHERE ws.ware_area_cd = #{wareAreaCd} ORDER BY ws.inbo_dt DESC
SELECT DISTINCT pi.pcode FROM ware_stock ws INNER JOIN prod_inbo pi ON ws.prod_inbo_cd = pi.prod_inbo_cd WHERE ws.ware_area_cd = #{wareAreaCd} AND ROWNUM = 1 -- 첫 번째 제품코드만 반환

SELECT DISTINCT ws.ware_area_cd, wd.area_row, wd.area_col, wd.area_floor, wd.vol, NVL(area_stock.current_volume, 0) as current_volume, (wd.vol - NVL(area_stock.current_volume, 0)) as available_volume FROM ware_stock ws INNER JOIN prod_inbo pi ON ws.prod_inbo_cd = pi.prod_inbo_cd INNER JOIN ware_d wd ON ws.ware_area_cd = wd.ware_area_cd INNER JOIN warehouse w ON wd.wcode = w.wcode AND wd.ware_ver_cd = w.ware_ver_cd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ware_area_cd, SUM(qty) as current_volume FROM ware_stock GROUP BY ware_area_cd ) area_stock ON ws.ware_area_cd = area_stock.ware_area_cd WHERE pi.pcode = #{pcode} AND w.fcode = #{fcode} AND ws.ware_area_cd != #{excludeAreaCd} AND (wd.vol - NVL(area_stock.current_volume, 0)) > 0 -- 잔여 용량이 있는 곳만 ORDER BY available_volume DESC

SELECT pcode, prod_ver_cd, prod_name, prod_unit_price, wei, unit, edate, sto_temp, safe_stock, pac_unit, cha_rea, is_used, reg_dt, prime_cost, note, regi, modi FROM product WHERE pcode = #{pcode} AND is_used = 'f1'
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(wslcode, -3))), 0) as last_seq FROM ware_stock WHERE wslcode LIKE 'WStock-' || #{dateStr} || '-%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ware_stock ( wslcode, ware_area_cd, mate_inbo_cd, prod_inbo_cd, item_type, inbo_dt, regi, qty, unit ) VALUES ( #{wslcode}, #{wareAreaCd}, NULL, -- 제품입고코드는 NULL (자재이므로) #{prodInboCd}, 'h3', -- 자재타입에 따라 동적 설정 #{inboDt}, #{regi}, #{qty}, #{unit} )
